main event: A reddish orange to whitish object was observed moving at a high rate of speed for 2-3 seconds before its light flickered out or blew out.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a cigarette.
It was very likely that the object was a meteor or gas bag balloon, and the 'tiny orange spark' could have been burning gas.
There was no physical evidence or photographs taken of the object.
The witness appears to be reliable and did not embellish the incident.
